title: Holiday Break: December 23rd to January 3rd
description: Stratechery is on holiday from December 23, 2024 to January 3, 2025; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, January 6. author: Ben Thompson
excerpt: Stratechery is on holiday from December 23, 2024 to January 3, 2025; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, January 6. In addition, the next episode of Sharp Tech will be on Monday, January…
text: Posted onMonday, December 23, 2024Sunday, December 29, 2024 Stratechery is on holiday from December 23, 2024 to January 3, 2025; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, January 6. In addition, the next episode of Sharp Tech will be on Monday, January 6, the next episode of Dithering will be on Tuesday, January 7. Sharp China will return the week of January 13. The full Stratechery posting schedule is here. Related
html:
Posted onMonday, December 23, 2024Sunday, December 29, 2024

Stratechery is on holiday from December 23, 2024 to January 3, 2025; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, January 6.

In addition, the next episode of Sharp Tech will be on Monday, January 6, the next episode of Dithering will be on Tuesday, January 7. Sharp China will return the week of January 13.

The full Stratechery posting schedule is here.

Related
